0.text: Bug 7406  NPE: adaptable and filters don't work together for property page contributions.

1.text: If a property page contribution is filtered by project nature, and its marked  as adaptable, the filter is ignored for the adapted case.

2.text: Specifically, our  CVS property page shows up on non-CVS Java Projects.

3.text: As a result, the following steps in our 2.0 work will cause a NPE:  1.

4.text: Open the property dialog on a Java project in the Packages view which hasn't  yet been connected to a CVS repository (so no CVS nature).

6.text: You will erroneously have a CVS page.

7.text: Go to the CVS page but dont make any  changes.

9.text: Go to another page, make a change, Finish.

10.text: You will get a NPE from the CVS properties page finish because the project  isn't a CVS project and the page should never have been there.
